meaningMnemonic: What do <radical>stairs</radical> do? They take you <kanji>from</kanji> where you were, to somewhere else. They're a way to get <kanji>from</kanji> place to place.
readingMnemonic: If you're going <kanji>from</kanji> place to place, make sure you have some <reading>no</reading>ri (の) seaweed on you, in case you get hungry. Nori is a great source of energy.
